alert.note: Alert for Kane (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 12:56PM MDT until June 29 at 1:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Kane County in southern Utah... * Until 130 PM MDT * At 1255 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southeast of Zion National Park, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Orderville and Mt Carmel. This includes US Route 89 between mile markers 73 and 84. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
